    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:45.080
    | text      = Sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:46.080
    | text      = It was important to chronicle it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:47.080
    | text      = Even if Alex's response to it was not necessarily as interesting as you might have expected.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:53.279
    | text      = I'm pretty sure we had this conversation at the same time, which was, it's going to be
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:57.480
    | text      = disappointing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:58.480
    | text      = Probably.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:11:59.480
    | text      = It's just probably going to be disappointing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:00.480
    | text      = I don't recall if we necessarily had that conversation, but we definitely could have.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:04.679
    | text      = It's a mind belt.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:06.399
    | text      = So that took on a life of its own.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:10.080
    | text      = And also, through those couple weeks, I was trying to move, which took up a ton of my
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:14.539
    | text      = time.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:15.539
    | text      = Our episode from Friday about Owen's dumb push-up contest was the product of multiple
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:19.159
    | text      = influences.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:20.240
    | text      = The first was that Alex had been out of studio all week.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:23.000
    | text      = The second was that I really needed something kind of light to discuss since we were recording
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:26.879
    | text      = just a few days after I moved, and I was still working on settling into this new place.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:31.120
    | text      = And Owen's dumb push-up contest fit that bill amazingly.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:34.440
    | text      = It is empty.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:35.440
    | text      = I would probably have rather done a Bill Cooper, Oklahoma City episode.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:39.080
    | text      = Like I even said on the episode, this isn't the kind of meaty thing I want to be doing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:43.879
    | text      = But I just couldn't swing it for a couple of reasons.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:46.679
    | text      = The first was a time issue.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:48.600
    | text      = Cooper episodes are dense, and they require a lot more prep time.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:52.179
    | text      = The second issue is probably more important, and that was that I needed to finish reading
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:55.740
    | text      = Bill Cooper's biography, Pale Horse Rider.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:12:59.080
    | text      = Our show focuses on Alex Jones, who doesn't have a biography written about him yet.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:03.360
    | text      = So the idea of reading one about another person we were covering seemed strange to me.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:07.559
    | text      = I almost felt like cheating.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:09.279
    | text      = I really enjoy the process of discovery that comes from having no idea what's going to
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:12.919
    | text      = come up, and we're just diving in and learning as we go.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:16.539
    | text      = That works all right with Alex or these space weirdos, but I realize that with Bill Cooper,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:20.519
    | text      = not consulting that text is essentially missing a big part of the story.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:24.960
    | text      = There are important pieces of context in that biography that I wouldn't ever have gotten
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:29.320
    | text      = from just listening to the hour or the time, and those pieces of context are pretty important.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:33.980
    | text      = So I felt it would be irresponsible for me to move forward and do another episode about
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:37.460
    | text      = Bill Cooper without taking in that biography and really sitting with it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:42.860
    | text      = This leads me to what I would want to give as a sort of sizable clarification.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:49.500
    | text      = We were wrong to give Bill the benefit of the doubt as it relates to him being a gigantic
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:53.039
    | text      = piece of shit.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:54.039
    | text      = Oh, great.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:55.039
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:56.039
    | text      = Why do we always find that out?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:13:57.039
    | text      = I seem like a bit of a drunk and an asshole, but I was unaware of how violently abusive
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:01.340
    | text      = he was to his wives.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:02.960
    | text      = This, among other revelations, have caused me to question my stance of, hey, Bill's bad,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:07.279
    | text      = but at least he's not Alex.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:08.279
    | text      = Yeah, yeah, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:09.279
    | text      = I was unaware of a lot of the depths of some of the stuff in his personal life, and that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:15.840
    | text      = was wrong of us to... Well, I don't know if it was wrong.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:19.240
    | text      = It was incomplete of us.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:20.600
    | text      = Yeah, yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:21.600
    | text      = The problem is we're dealing almost exclusively with tremendous monsters, so we're so far
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:28.159
    | text      = below the Mendoza line of just general being a fair human being that simply because we
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:33.960
    | text      = speak about you on our show, chances are you should assume that they're the worst human
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:38.600
    | text      = being in the world.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:39.960
    | text      = Maybe so, but this, I mean, it's a pretty big part of his life.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:45.120
    | text      = He pushed one of his wives out of a moving car while she was holding their daughter.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:50.080
    | text      = Right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:51.080
    | text      = Like, he's a fucking monster.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:52.639
    | text      = Yeah, that's a monster.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:53.639
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:54.639
    | text      = That's a monster.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:14:55.639
    | text      = Yeah, I mean, the level to which he was that is something that... I don't know if we played
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:01.639
    | text      = down, but we weren't aware of the depths of it, and I feel bad about that, and now knowing
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:07.440
    | text      = that... Like any glowing biography of Norman Mailer,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:10.240
    | text      = you're wrong.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:11.759
    | text      = I would like to now, knowing this stuff, make an apology for not being aware of this earlier.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:17.720
    | text      = Overall, I think that book, Pale Horse Rider, does a really good job of demonstrating how
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:22.620
    | text      = much of a liar Bill Cooper was without outright making accusations.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:26.919
    | text      = Beyond these things, there was one piece of information in that book that's very relevant
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:31.360
    | text      = to our current exploration about Oklahoma City, which I highly doubt I would have learned
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:36.159
    | text      = about from listening to Bill's show.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:38.080
    | text      = We'll get to that down the road, and also the thing that made me dance around my apartment
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:42.240
    | text      = as we go through this.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:43.519
    | text      = Also, I recommend that book very highly.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:46.279
    | text      = It's pretty good.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:47.279
    | text      = I'm going to read it now.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:48.279
    | text      = I'm excited.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:49.279
    | text      = We're going to start this off where we left off.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:51.899
    | text      = We left off a couple days after the bombing, and our next episode is on April 24th.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:15:58.200
    | text      = If you don't recall, Bill Cooper had largely decided that it was a false flag, trying to
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:05.159
    | text      = make patriots look bad, standard operating, right-wing militia kind of narrative.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:11.600
    | text      = One of his big pieces of it was that seismograph that he was misinterpreting that alleged to
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:18.960
    | text      = show two bombs, and then misunderstandings about people who had gotten on police scanners
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:25.279
    | text      = and said that they thought that there was another bomb in the building.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:28.960
    | text      = Bill has just taken those things and used them as definitive proof.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:32.919
    | text      = Examples of incuriousness leading to disaster.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:36.460
    | text      = And conclusion jumping, run amok.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:38.919
    | text      = Monsters.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:39.919
    | text      = So, we jump in here as Bill begins on April 24th, 1995.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:45.759
    | text      = I'm William Cooper, and you're listening to The Hour of the Time.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:49.759
    | text      = Well, we have a much larger audience tonight, folks, thanks to the propaganda press.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:16:56.320
    | text      = And a lot of the new audience are the press, who I am absolutely refused to even talk to
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:02.279
    | text      = except to tell them to go themselves.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:07.960
    | text      = And I will continue that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:08.960
    | text      = What did he mean?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:09.960
    | text      = They are wise.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:10.960
    | text      = They are scum.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:11.960
    | text      = They have no moral values, they have no ethics, and they certainly wouldn't know the truth
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:19.680
    | text      = if it hit them in the head.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:21.400
    | text      = Bill's on shortwave and he does a better job of censoring himself than Alex does.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:26.200
    | text      = It's pretty remarkable.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:28.640
    | text      = So there's such an interesting phenomenon that seems almost entirely consistent, which
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:32.720
    | text      = is that when there's terrifying, seemingly random tragedies in this country, people flock
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:37.359
    | text      = to whoever is most loudly calling it fake.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:40.380
    | text      = Alex got a huge surge out of 9-11 denial, and we've seen him explicitly discuss how
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:44.839
    | text      = his traffic increased in the days after the Boston bombing when he was yelling about it
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:48.880
    | text      = being a false flag.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:50.519
    | text      = We've also seen him discuss lately how his COVID-19 denialism led to an increase in viewership.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:55.859
    | text      = This makes some sense, but it also says something really sad about people.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:17:59.400
    | text      = It's scary to process things like a bombing or a virus outbreak, and we crave easy answers.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:04.160
    | text      = A pandemic is terrifying and there's no easy fix to it, so it becomes very appealing to
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:08.160
    | text      = listen to the person saying that the virus itself is no big deal and that all the actual
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:12.160
    | text      = problems could be solved by killing the globalists.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:15.039
    | text      = A random bombing carried out by domestic extremists is super terrifying because no matter how
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:19.299
    | text      = much the police might try, they'll never be able to uncover and stop every possible plot
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:24.119
    | text      = people may come up with.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:25.839
    | text      = It's just a reassuring thought to believe that, you know, there's an evil cabal of globalists
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:30.039
    | text      = who are orchestrating all of these bombings, and if they're just taken care of, the bombings
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:33.240
    | text      = will magically go away.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:34.480
    | text      = Yeah, if you had to grapple with the reality that ultimately no one knows what's going
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:39.559
    | text      = on, the world is complete chaos, and really you can bully a lot of people who think they're
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:44.119
    | text      = powerful into doing whatever it is you want them to do.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:47.160
    | text      = So that's kind of scary.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:49.559
    | text      = That's a real bummer.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:50.559
    | text      = It is.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:51.559
    | text      = It is terrifying.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:52.559
    | text      = Yeah, it's really terrifying.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:53.559
    | text      = In times of crisis, these kinds of narratives are an attractive crutch to reach out for,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:18:56.900
    | text      = and I'm depressed but not surprised to see the people who are behaving the same way back
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:00.640
    | text      = in the times of Bill Cooper.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:02.720
    | text      = It's unfortunate for the listeners because all they get is junk food narratives that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:06.359
    | text      = mean nothing and go nowhere, but it's also bad for people like Bill and Alex.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:10.660
    | text      = They learn the wrong lessons from this kind of reinforcement.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:13.920
    | text      = They learn, whether consciously or not, that denying tragedy is something that draws, which
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:18.119
    | text      = definitely has been a lesson that screwed Alex over more than once.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:22.279
    | text      = Yeah, well, personally, I think it's a bad idea to just immediately deny something happened.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:29.900
    | text      = That's just me, though.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:30.900
    | text      = That's an interesting angle that you have.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:32.440
    | text      = I've been known-
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:33.440
    | text      = Prove your case.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:34.440
    | text      = Lately, I've been known for my hot takes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:37.960
    | text      = I've been tossing them around left and right, hot takes like, hey, let's not kill people.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:43.039
    | text      = Hey, Jordan.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:44.039
    | text      = Hey.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:45.039
    | text      = Jordan, that's a tree.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:46.039
    | text      = Prove it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:47.039
    | text      = Shit.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:48.039
    | text      = I don't even know what you're wearing right now.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:52.200
    | text      = Shirt.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:53.200
    | text      = Prove it.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:19:54.200
    | text      = Yeah, I mean, a knee-jerk denial of things that are really scary and providing easy answers
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:01.640
    | text      = and identifiable explanations for things.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:06.400
    | text      = It is an attractive thing, and it's just sad.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:09.799
    | text      = I mean, I don't know.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:12.160
    | text      = Like I said, it's a bummer, but it's expected.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:16.000
    | text      = I think it's really interesting, just because deep down, regardless of you can hate authority
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:22.559
    | text      = or you can love authority, whomever may be in power at any given point in time, but what
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:26.880
    | text      = unites most people is just that, I want to believe somebody is in charge.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:32.680
    | text      = I want to believe there's an adult in the room.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 00:20:35.079
    | text      = There needs to be an adult in the room, and there simply aren't.
}}

    | text      = He is lying.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:29:37.039
    | text      = That doesn't sound true.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:29:38.520
    | text      = There's a long pause.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:29:40.720
    | text      = And the only way that you can really get around a comment like that is just how do you define
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:29:44.319
    | text      = patriotic American?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:29:46.479
    | text      = If you're going to say that-
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:29:47.720
    | text      = No true Scotsman.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:29:48.720
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:29:49.720
    | text      = If you're going to say that saying that Waco justifies the Oklahoma City bombing precludes
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:29:54.880
    | text      = you from being a patriotic American, then this is just axiomatic.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:29:58.880
    | text      = If that's one of the things that's disqualifying, then yes, no patriotic American would believe
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:03.359
    | text      = that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:04.359
    | text      = But I mean, Timothy McVeigh definitely thought that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:08.039
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:09.039
    | text      = And I would be shocked if there wasn't at least one episode of Bill Cooper's own show
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:13.159
    | text      = where he said, this justifies some sort of response that is commensurate with what the
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:19.039
    | text      = government did.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:20.039
    | text      = I can't-
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:21.039
    | text      = And so on and so forth.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:22.039
    | text      = I can't say so.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:23.039
    | text      = I'm not saying-
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:24.039
    | text      = I would be reticent to make a prediction of that, but I wouldn't be too surprised.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:28.039
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:29.039
    | text      = But there is also a ton... I mean, it's ludicrous to say that that wasn't a position that some
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:35.500
    | text      = people held.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:36.500
    | text      = No.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:37.500
    | text      = Absolutely.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:38.500
    | text      = Maybe it wasn't all militias.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:39.500
    | text      = Probably wasn't.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:40.500
    | text      = I'm sure that there were a lot of people who were horrified by the events that transpired
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:44.640
    | text      = and were condemning.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:47.279
    | text      = I'm positive of that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:49.060
    | text      = But there is a contingent of people who would have those beliefs.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:30:54.880
    | text      = And the only real way that this works is Bill's definition games.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:00.479
    | text      = And I think that that's important for his preserving some sense of self.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:05.739
    | text      = So Bill has a big plan.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:07.859
    | text      = He's going to get to the bottom of both Oklahoma City and Waco.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:11.319
    | text      = Is he going to buy a TV station along the way?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:13.159
    | text      = It is as harebrained.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:14.800
    | text      = I'm going to ask that every American gather evidence and proof and begin an investigation
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:22.039
    | text      = to find the culprits, the perpetrators, and help bring to justice the murderers of Oklahoma
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:32.239
    | text      = City and the murderers of Waco, Texas.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:38.880
    | text      = These were both despicable acts, and we are going to find out who did it, and we are going
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:47.119
    | text      = to raise a fund that is going to ensure that somebody comes out and talks.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:54.439
    | text      = And I hope you all participate.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:31:56.359
    | text      = This is going to come back on you, Bill Clinton, and Janet Reno, and FBI, and BATF, and whoever
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:05.520
    | text      = and however did the bombing in Oklahoma City.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:12.279
    | text      = I mean, it looks like you don't need to do that investigation part.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:15.239
    | text      = You've already decided.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:16.239
    | text      = No, and I think he's done.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:18.079
    | text      = I think his investigation has been completed already.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:20.680
    | text      = Great.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:21.680
    | text      = Yeah, we're going to raise up a whole bunch of money in order to lure some very competent
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:26.880
    | text      = grifter to tell a great story that confirms my theories.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:30.760
    | text      = Larry Nichols' ears perked up.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:32.439
    | text      = Yeah, exactly.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:33.439
    | text      = What's that?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:34.439
    | text      = I can hear money.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:35.439
    | text      = I got to go to work.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:37.439
    | text      = Someone's offering him money.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:38.840
    | text      = These guys like the soft rice.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:41.880
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:43.039
    | text      = Great plan.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:44.039
    | text      = Yeah.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:45.039
    | text      = So we've got one last clip here, and it's Bill giving a theory about how we're going
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:48.619
    | text      = to get rid of this menace that's known as Bill Clinton.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:51.439
    | text      = Right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:52.439
    | text      = And, spoiler alert, didn't work.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:32:54.159
    | text      = I cannot believe that this nation has sunk so low, or that we have someone of the despicable
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:33:01.079
    | text      = character such as Bill Clinton in our White House.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:33:07.720
    | text      = It does not speak well for America.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:33:10.079
    | text      = And we're going to have to change that in the next election, and the way to do it is
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:33:14.359
    | text      = to join the Constitution Party.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:33:17.479
    | text      = You'll find a form to do that in the next issue of Veritas, which, by the way, you should
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:33:24.960
    | text      = all be subscribing to, because it's the only place that you're ever going to read the truth.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:33:29.920
    | text      = So at this point, Bill Cooper had gone all in on the Constitution Party, also known as
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:33:35.020
    | text      = the U.S. Taxpayers Party.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:33:36.840
    | text      = They were never a viable party, and at no point have they ever fielded a candidate that
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:33:41.399
    | text      = has received more than 0.2% of the vote for president.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:33:44.359
    | text      = Who got 0.2?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:33:45.359
    | text      = I don't remember.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:33:47.199
    | text      = But they've also never won an electoral vote.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:33:49.319
    | text      = Well, of course not.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:33:50.319
    | text      = In 1996, Howard Phillips was running his second of three campaigns for president on the ticket,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:33:55.439
    | text      = and he managed to come in sixth.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:33:57.479
    | text      = This was an improvement over the 1992 election, where he came in seventh.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:02.000
    | text      = I'm not sure that they've even ever successfully fielded a candidate for Congress.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:06.560
    | text      = In 2018, I can find one seat that the party won, and it was in North Carolina, the Green
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:12.199
    | text      = County Commissioner election for District 3.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:15.439
    | text      = Anyway.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:18.680
    | text      = Get that guy out of here.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:20.199
    | text      = What are you doing?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:21.199
    | text      = He needs to be impeached.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:24.279
    | text      = If you're a member of that party, you gotta go.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:26.840
    | text      = I don't know anything about the Green County Commission.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:29.640
    | text      = Maybe he's a good commissioner.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:30.640
    | text      = Who knows?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:31.640
    | text      = Anyway, Bill's on board with this party, because that's what people like him are supposed to
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:35.479
    | text      = do.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:36.479
    | text      = They're supposed to be on a team that never wins, because then they never have to deal
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:39.840
    | text      = with what comes after winning, and you always have a ready excuse for why you lost.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:44.960
    | text      = This is the one thing that Alex forgot to include in his impression of Bill Cooper,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:50.720
    | text      = and it's bad news.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:52.319
    | text      = You never want to win.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:53.319
    | text      = Nope.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:54.319
    | text      = You never want to win.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:34:55.399
    | text      = That's why you stay with Ron Paul, stay with the Constitution Party, stay with those sorts
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:00.479
    | text      = of principled also-rans.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:05.119
    | text      = That's the way to go.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:06.119
    | text      = If you need a little bit more juice, go straight Libertarian Party, although that's never really
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:11.000
    | text      = going to work out for you, because then you gotta be in favor of Gary Johnson.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:14.359
    | text      = You gotta do a whole thing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:15.359
    | text      = Alex couldn't do that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:16.359
    | text      = No, no, no, no.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:17.359
    | text      = So I mean, I found this a little bit disappointing as a stretch of time, because I really don't
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:22.560
    | text      = think that there was much coverage of the bombing.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:26.720
    | text      = There was talk of, you sort of decided it's fake, or what have you.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:30.539
    | text      = There's a lot of yelling about Waco, and then beyond that, it's sort of largely continuations
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:36.479
    | text      = of the threads that had already started previously that have, I guess, proven that it was a false
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:42.859
    | text      = flag or something, which I'm utterly unconvinced by.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:46.560
    | text      = Oh, are you?
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:47.560
    | text      = Yes.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:48.560
    | text      = But I mean, hey, look.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:50.560
    | text      = We now have within our field of awareness that Bill may have met Timothy McVeigh.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:57.319
    | text      = That's so wild.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:58.579
    | text      = That's just so wild.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:35:59.979
    | text      = And that Bill is name dropping Larry Nichols, and that means that he might do it again.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:05.199
    | text      = I don't think Larry's ever been on his show, because I would have seen his name scrolling
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:10.520
    | text      = through, and that would have been the first episode we did.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:12.840
    | text      = No, no.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:13.840
    | text      = We're on that one.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:14.840
    | text      = Yeah, for sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:15.840
    | text      = All day.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:16.840
    | text      = All day.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:17.840
    | text      = I don't think he's ever been on the show, but I wouldn't be surprised if, especially
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:20.020
    | text      = as Whitewater is continuing to go along, and anti-Clinton sentiment gets higher, and as
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:25.039
    | text      = Linda Thompson, who did the Clinton body count, comes on Bill's show as a guest.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:29.600
    | text      = He might be quoted in reference.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:31.319
    | text      = Right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:32.319
    | text      = I could see Larry Nichols becoming more of a prominent figure in the Cooperverse, and
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:38.840
    | text      = it might necessitate a phone call.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:40.720
    | text      = I don't think he's going to take your call anymore.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:42.840
    | text      = I think he will.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:43.840
    | text      = I might.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:44.840
    | text      = He is not busy.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:45.840
    | text      = That is true.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:46.840
    | text      = So, I would like to apologize sincerely for the delay, this from the part one episode,
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:53.680
    | text      = and we'll continue.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:54.680
    | text      = I'll try to do my best to...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:56.840
    | text      = I'm pretty sure everyone blames you for that.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:58.880
    | text      = I think they do.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:36:59.880
    | text      = Yeah, I'm pretty sure.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:00.880
    | text      = Yeah, certainly don't blame you.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:03.760
    | text      = I meant there were other circumstances going on that may have distracted you, and not your
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:07.399
    | text      = personal decision making, but...
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:08.960
    | text      = That's nice, Colonel.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:09.960
    | text      = That's nice.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:10.960
    | text      = But yeah, we'll keep on this thread, because I do know that the conspiracy evolves.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:17.560
    | text      = It just didn't in these couple days.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:20.000
    | text      = There really isn't that much growth, and so we'll see what the section chief brings up
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:25.800
    | text      = next time.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:27.800
    | text      = But until then, Jordan, we have a website.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:29.199
    | text      = We do have a website.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:30.199
    | text      = It's knowledgefight.com.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:31.199
    | text      = That's right.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:32.199
    | text      = We're also on Twitter.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:33.199
    | text      = We are on Twitter.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:34.199
    | text      = It's at knowledgefight.com.
}}

{{TranscriptBlock
    | name      = Unknown Speaker
    | timestamp = 01:37:35.199
    | text      = Now go to bed, Jordan.
}}
